DOC.detailed_description: After approval Ethics Committee sign consent , prospective randomize study perform patient ≥ 18 year , locally advanced cancer / metastasis , pain intensity ≤ 6 . There excluded patient difficulty maintain clinical follow-up , cognitive impairment prior treatment opioids . G1 patient treat accord guideline WHO analgesic ladder start first step , paracetamol 1g 6 hour , maximum dose 4 g/ day , second , codeine ( 30 mg 4 hour , maximum dose 360 mg / day morphine 10 mg 4 hour third step . Patients G2 start morphine 10 mg 4 hour . Adjuvant drug associate indicate . According intensity pain medication change accord analgesic ladder G1 patient adjust dose G2 . The cancer therapy palliative radiotherapy , chemotherapy hormone therapy perform oncologist . There evaluate : pain intensity every 2 wk . visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , quality life every 4 wk . brief questionnaire quality life WHO 19 , satisfaction treatment , physical capacity measure index Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) 20 , need additional analgesic . Adverse effect record . The study consider complete patient 's death three month follow-up . To calculate minimum sample size use program BioEstat 2.0 . There used reference mean standard deviation value study similar method 5 . Considering confidence level 95 % study power 80 % minimum sample 30 patient group , total 60 patient . For statistical analysis use GraphPad Prism ® . There used Student test age , weight , height , chi-square test patient satisfaction , need complementation , adverse effect , Mann-Whitney test pain intensity , quality life physical capacity . A p value ≤ 0,05 consider significant . The resultas express mean ± DP .
